actions.abilityText:
If your opponent has a goop buff card in their discard pile, this attack gains
+4[ATK].


Choose a goop card from the opponentâ€™s discard pile. Your opponent shuffles that card into their deck.

Recoil X+1[ATK], where X is the number of goop cards in your discard pile.

Shuffle all goop cards from your discard pile into your opponent's deck.

Put up to three of the top cards of your opponent's deck in their discard pile. If any of these cards are goop cards, this monster gains
{"stat": "ATK", "num": 1, "isPositive": true}.
If this monster's [ATK][PQ] is at max, this monster heals 1[HP] instead.
